import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Card, Form, FloatingLabel, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useAuth } from '../../../../AuthContext' import { app } from '../../../../firebase' import { getStorage, ref } from "firebase/storage" const CreatePost = () => { const { currentUser } = useAuth() const [postTitle, setPostTitle] = useState() const [postDetails, setPostDetails] = useState() const [postActive, setPostActive] = useState(false) const [postImg, setPostImg] = useState() function handleBoxClick() { !postActive ? setPostActive(true) : setPostActive(false) } function handleSubmitClick() { console.log(currentUser.uid) console.log(postTitle) console.log(postDetails) console.log(postActive) console.log(postImg) console.log(app) } return (
Create Post
setPostTitle(e.target.value)} /> setPostDetails(e.target.value)} /> Attachment setPostImg(e.target.files[0])} />
) } export default CreatePost
